# Balanced Agent Configuration

This agent provides a **balance between speed and capability** for most development tasks.

## Characteristics

- **Speed**: ⚡⚡ Fast
- **Complexity**: ⭐⭐⭐ Moderate
- **Model**: Sonnet or equivalent balanced model
- **Max Tokens**: 16000
- **Temperature**: 0.5 (balanced creativity)

## Capabilities

- Feature development
- Bug investigation and fixes
- Code reviews
- Moderate refactoring
- API integration
- Testing
- Performance optimization
- Security fixes

## Limitations

- May struggle with very large codebases
- Limited for complete system redesigns
- Not optimal for research-heavy tasks

## Use Cases

- Adding new features
- Fixing complex bugs
- Writing tests
- Refactoring modules
- API integrations
- Code reviews
- Documentation

## Example Prompts

- "Add user authentication with JWT tokens"
- "Fix the race condition in the message handler"
- "Refactor the Discord API client to use async/await"
- "Add pagination to the guild list"
- "Write unit tests for the message component"
